manpage.title: strpbrk, wcspbrk

description.para: Searches character in specified character set in the string.

return.para: Returns a pointer to the first occurrence of any character from strCharSet in str, or a NULL pointer if the two string arguments have no characters in common.

remarks.para: Each of the functions returns a pointer to the first occurrence of a character in str that belongs to the set of characters in strCharSet. The search does not include the terminating null character.wcspbrk is the wide-character version of strpbrk.
